archetypeDir: The directory where Hugo finds archetype files (content templates).
assetDir: The directory where Hugo finds asset files used in Hugo Pipes.
baseURL: The absolute URL (protocol, host, path, and trailing slash) of your published site
build.cacheBusters.item.source: A regexp matching file(s) relative to one of the virtual component directories in Hugo.
build.cacheBusters.item.target: A regexp matching the keys in the resource cache that should be expired when source changes. You can use the matching regexp groups from source in the expression
buildFuture: Include content with a future publication date.
capitalizeListTitles: Whether to capitalize automatic list titles. Applicable to section, taxonomy, and term pages.
cascade: Pass down default configuration values (front matter) to pages in the content tree. The options in site config is the same as in page front matter.
cleanDesinationDir: When building, removes files from destination not found in static directories.
contentDir: The directory from where Hugo reads content files.
copyright: Copyright notice for your site, typically displayed in the footer.
dataDir: The directory from where Hugo reads data files.
defaultContentLanguage: Content without language indicator will default to this language.
defaultContentLanguageInSubdir: Render the default content language in subdir.
enableEmoji: Enable Emoji emoticons support for page content; see the emoji shortcode quick reference guide
ignoreLogs: A slice of message identifiers corresponding to warnings and errors you wish to suppress.
languageCode: A language tag as defined by RFC 5646
markup.goldmark.parser.autoHeadingIDType: The strategy used to automatically generate heading id attributes.
markup.goldmark.parser.attribute.block: If true, enables Markdown attributes for block elements
markup.goldmark.parser.attribute.title: If true, enables Markdown attributes for headings
markup.goldmark.renderer.hardWraps: If true, Goldmark replaces newline characters within a paragraph with br elements.
markup.goldmark.renderer.unsafe: If true, Goldmark renders raw HTML mixed within the Markdown. This is unsafe unless the content is under your control.
markup.asciidocExt.attributes: A map of key-value pairs, each a document attribute.
markup.asciidocExt.failureLevel: The minimum logging level that triggers a non-zero exit code (failure).
markup.asciidocExt.noHeaderOrFooter: If true, outputs an embeddable document, which excludes the header, the footer, and everything outside the body of the document.
newContentEditor: The editor to use when creating new content.
noChmod: Donâ€™t sync permission mode of files.
noTimes: Don't sync modification ime of files.
panicOnWarning: Whether to panic on first WARNING.
pluralizeListTitles: Whether to pluralize automatic list titles. Applicable to section pages.
printI18nWarnings: Whether to log WARNINGs for each missing translation.
printPathWarnings: Whether to log WARNINGs when Hugo publishes two or more files to the same path.
printUnusedTemplates: Whether to log WARNINGs for each unused template.
publishDir: The directory to where Hugo will write the final static site (the HTML files etc.).
templateMetrics: Whether to print template execution metrics to the console.
themeDir: The directory where Hugo reads the themes from.
title: Site title.
watch: Watch filesystem for changes and recreate as needed.
